title: I'm not dead, just busy
body: To repent for my lack of posts, and regain ground in the sacred 18 to 35 male demographic, I've added a new phlog all about... well, you'll just have to find out for yourself. Woo hoo!
author: Dan

comments.author: mike
comments.body:
Oh... oh, I'm the first person... this is so exciting. [inner dialogue: "don't blow it, mike, play it cool"]

Don't feel guilty about not posting as often, everyone knows you have good reason. Maybe you should get a few film students to start following you around with a camera for these last few weeks and document your progress up until opening night - then they could just post video of you at the end of the day... You could even screen their film at your theatre... It's genius! Or... something.

comments.author: Nicki J
comments.body:
You assume only the male demographic would be interested. Haha.

*coughs*

Anyway.

I now have this urgent need to reaffirm my straightness. Thanks, Dan.

Don't mind me. It's WAY past my bedtime.

comments.author: Rachel
comments.body: I like how on the Moxie Phlog toolbar-type-thing it looks like Nicole is disgusted with Dan's bleeding finger.
